thread.title: This Mom Sent Her Son a Care Package Filled With Trash Because She's a Parenting Genius
thread.title_full: This Mom Sent Her Son a Care Package Filled With Trash Because She's a Parenting Genius

author: Laura Beck
title: This Mom Sent Her Son a Care Package Filled With Trash Because She's a Parenting Genius
text:
This Mom Sent Her Son a Care Package Filled With Trash Because She's a Parenting Genius 
I try to never say this, but: YES, QUEEN. Twitter By Laura Beck Feb 18, 2017 Connor Cox is a student at Westminster College, and his mom, Terri, is a boss. After returning to college, Connor left behind a bunch of trash and so what did Terri do? She mailed it to him. He thought he was opening up a care package filled with tasty treats, and instead it was a bunch of his own stinky trash. *Insert ten million laughing-til-I-cry emojis, because this is PARENTING PERFECTION.* I want to have a kid just so I can do this to him. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Thought my mom was sending me a care package... but instead she sent me a box of trash i was supposed to take out. pic.twitter.com/UetdT5UoVP — Connor Cox (@thedeal_5) January 30, 2017 Terri spoke to BuzzFeed about why she had to take some drastic actions. "I have raised and taught Connor better than this, and his actions deserve consequences — even if they are humorous." Terri, you are a queen, and Connor, listen to your mom!!! Follow Laura on Twitter .
